Setup

Maven

Adding Perf4J to your application is so easy with Tapestry support for autoloading modules that all you need to do is to include the tapestry-perf4j module as a Maven dependency:

<dependency>
    <groupId>com.kalixia.tapestry</groupId>
    <artifactId>tapestry-perf4j</artifactId>
    <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>

This will of course only work if you declare the tapestry-perf4j repository in your pom.xml:

<repository>
    <id>tapestry-perf4j</id>
    <url>http://kalixia.github.com/tapestry-perf4j/repository/</url>
</repository>

Tapestry will then find out that the tapestry-perf4j module is available and initialize it properly.

Don't forget to setup Perf4J in order to get it working!

Profiling Pages and Services
